title: The One With All The Poker

questions.question: What does Ross say he becomes when he plays poker?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'once those cards are dealt... I'm not a nice guy.'

questions.question: What is Rachel trying to get a job as at Sak's Fifth Avenue?
questions.explanation: Rachel says she would be 'shopping for a living' as an assistant buyer.

questions.question: What does Phoebe claim to have done to the money she gives to the guys?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I cursed it. So now bad things will happen to he who spends it.'

questions.question: Why does Joey decide not to eat a pizza during the poker game?
options: Rachel is waiting to hear from a job and the store closes at nine
questions.correct_answer: Rachel is waiting to hear from a job and the store closes at nine
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I'll just have a Tic-Tac to hold me over' because Rachel is waiting to hear from a job.

questions.question: What does Ross do when Rachel wins a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Ross reaches for Rachel's cards and tries to see what she has.

questions.question: What does Aunt Iris teach the girls about poker?
questions.explanation: Aunt Iris says 'Lesson number one... everything you hear at a poker game is pure crap' and demonstrates bluffing.

questions.question: What does Rachel do when she loses the potential job at Sak's Fifth Avenue?
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Yes, we do' when the others suggest continuing the poker game.

questions.question: What is the final hand that Rachel wins with?
questions.explanation: Rachel lays down a full house to win the hand.

questions.question: What game are the friends playing at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: The friends are playing Pictionary at Monica's apartment.

questions.question: What does Monica draw in Pictionary that the guys incorrectly guess as an airplane?
questions.explanation: Monica draws a picture that the guys guess is an airplane, but she says it's a bird.

questions.question: What does Ross say is impressed by Rachel's 'excellent compuper skills'?
questions.explanation: Ross is being sarcastic when he says 'I'm sure they'll be impressed with your excellent compuper skills'.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe think the guys don't want to play poker with the girls?
options: Because they think the girls will win
Because they think the girls don't know how to play
Because they don't want to lose
questions.correct_answer: Because they think the girls don't know how to play
questions.explanation: Phoebe asks 'What is it? Some kind of guy thing? Like it's poker, so only guys can play?'

questions.question: What does Chandler compare his 'ya-yas' to?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Yes, and I get my ya-yas from Ikea. You have to put them together yourself, but they cost a little less'.

questions.question: What song does Marcel put on the CD player?
questions.explanation: Marcel puts on the song 'The Lion Sleeps Tonight' and starts dancing.

questions.question: What does Joey compare himself to when he folds in a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I fold like a cheap hooker who got hit in the stomach by a fat guy with sores on his face'.

questions.question: What does Rachel deal herself when she is the dealer in a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Rachel deals herself two cards as the dealer.

questions.question: How much money does Ross need to call Rachel's bet in a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Ross needs fifteen dollars to call Rachel's bet.

questions.question: What does Chandler give to Ross when he is short of money in a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Chandler gives Ross ten dollars when he is short of money.

questions.question: What does Joey give to Ross when he is short of money in a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Joey gives Ross five dollars when he is short of money.

questions.question: What is the name of the store where Rachel is waiting to hear from a job?
questions.explanation: Rachel is waiting to hear from a job at Sak's Fifth Avenue.

questions.question: What does Rachel say Ross's whole face is doing when he is losing at poker?
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Your whole face is getting red... little veins popping out on your temple'.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say is a coincidence when it comes to the word 'joker' and 'poker'?
options: They both start with the letter 'p'
They both have the letter 'j' in them
They both have the same number of letters
They both have the letter 'j' and 'p' in them
questions.correct_answer: They both have the letter 'j' and 'p' in them
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Joker' is 'poker' with a 'J'.

questions.question: What does Chandler say is 'joincidence' with a 'C'?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'That's... that's 'joincidence' with a 'C'!'

questions.question: What does Monica say she is going to do to the guys when they play poker again?
options: She will take all their money
questions.correct_answer: She will take all their money
questions.explanation: Monica says 'We will play you again, and we will win, and you will lose, and you will beg, and we will laugh, and we will take every last dime you have'.

questions.question: What does Rachel do when Ross tries to see her cards after she wins a hand of poker?
questions.explanation: Rachel covers up her cards when Ross tries to see them.

questions.question: What does Joey order to eat during the poker game?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I'll just have a Tic-Tac to hold me over'.

questions.question: What does Monica deal in the game of Pictionary?
questions.explanation: Monica draws a picture that the guys guess is an airplane, but she says it's a bird.
